name: 2023 the 6th International Conference on Knowledge Management Systems
content: Publication: All submissions will be peer reviewed by 2-3 reviewers, and the accepted papers will be recommended to published in International Journal of Knowledge Engineering (IJKE) ※ISSN: 2382-6185 ※DOI: 10.18178/IJKE ※Indexed by: Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest ※Template: http://www.ijke.org/IJKE\_template.doc
